name: DEATH AND TAXES (itch)
description:
In this fast paced game about tax evasion and leaf blowers, you can play with up to 3 friends (4 players total) to try to save your reputation by blowing paper and pedestrians off of ledges! Supports up to 4 players cooperatively, but is playable single-player. (Easier with more players, though.)

A short game by Angus Goucher, Braeden Trefethen and Jacob Nelan. Music by chiptami (https://battleofthebits.org/barracks/Profile/tree/). Thanks for playing!

Get the OST here: https://soundcloud.com/chiptami/sets/death-and-taxes-ost

PLAY ONLINE: http://serverdoesnt.works/deathandtaxes/
